The next step is to reduce U.S. unemployment, an issue Barack Obama should make ''the centerpiece'' of his annual State of the Union address on Jan. 25, the former Cabinet member said. The American people are expecting him to say something about what he's going to do to keep the economy moving forward, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell has criticized his own party in recent months while supporting Barack Obama 's ultimately successful fight for Senate ratification of a new nuclear-arms-reduction treaty with Russia. According to Ken Auletta 's sources, Eric Schmidt 's appetite for the job waned not because of the China decision, but because Google was struggling to deal with the success of Facebook and increased scrutiny from regulators. Google was becoming defensive. All of their social-network efforts had faltered. Facebook had replaced them as the hot tech company, the place vital engineers wanted to work, Ken Auletta writes. ''Complaints about Google bureaucracy intensified. Governments around the world were lobbing grenades at Google over privacy, copyright, and size issues.
